unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Useful stuff, especially with these unpredictable monsoons! Heard farmers in Maharashtra struggled last year despite paying premiums. My uncle, Krishnan from Kerala, swears by it since Onam is dependent on a good harvest. Hope Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana works better this year. Heard some babus in Delhi are streamlining the claims process. Must claim before Deepavali though, warna gaya paisa! Better than ending up with only biryani to eat.
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Useful stuff, especially with these unpredictable monsoons! Heard farmers in Maharashtra struggled last year despite paying premiums. My uncle, Krishnan from Kerala, swears by it since Onam is dependent on a good harvest. Hope Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana works better this year. Heard some babus in Delhi are streamlining the claims process. Must claim before Deepavali though, otherwise went money! Better than ending up with only biryani to eat.
